entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023
